mapper.update: update TB_HOUSE set HOUSE_NAME = #{houseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_REGION = #{houseRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_BEGIN = #{houseBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_END = #{houseEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_ROLE = #{houseRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_RULE = #{houseRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_PHONE = #{housePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_FLAG =#{houseFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_TIME=#{houseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where HOUSE_NUMBER = #{houseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select HOUSE_NUMBER, HOUSE_NAME, HOUSE_REGION, HOUSE_BEGIN, HOUSE_END, HOUSE_ROLE, HOUSE_RULE, HOUSE_PHONE, HOUSE_FLAG,HOUSE_TIME from TB_HOUSE where HOUSE_NUMBER = #{houseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select HOUSE_NUMBER, HOUSE_NAME, HOUSE_REGION, HOUSE_BEGIN, HOUSE_END, HOUSE_ROLE, HOUSE_RULE, HOUSE_PHONE, HOUSE_FLAG,HOUSE_TIME from TB_HOUSE
select * from (select * from TB_HOUSE order by dbms_random.value) where rownum <=1
mapper.delete:
delete from TB_HOUSE where HOUSE_NUMBER in
#{houseNumber}
mapper.select: select count(1) from TB_HOUSE where TB_HOUSE.HOUSE_NUMBER=#{houseNumber}
